I.R./ IRIS/ Zyber.

*Iron Raptor looked out over the conference Room (not sure who;s controling 
Cheetor now...so I'll let it go.), a sigh escaping her throat as she crossed 
her arms and leaned her hip against the front table.
Her body was there but her mind was dwelling on Prowl, wondering if he was 
alright and they got to Tavatron and Dinobot safely.
But she was worried, worried that he might not come back in one piece. That 
would also be another matter she would be forced to worry about, which she 
was.
But, then as she sighed again, a sudden and sharp pain seemed to rip from 
her spark cavity and seemed to spread over all of her limbs.
She drew in a quick breath and quickly uncrossed her arms, thinking that it 
might ease the pain and let a little more are into her lungs.
But even just as her arms fell at her sides the pain receeded and finally 
left, leaving her with a constant ache all over her body.
Iron Raptor swallowed hard and closed her optics for a moment, wondering 
just what that pain could ever be.
She wasn't damaged and her circuits were just fine.
Then...what could it possably be?
Iron Raptor opened her optics then, lifting her hand to her face only to 
stop and watch it before it reached her cheek.
It was tremmbling, her hand.
She growled and closed that hand into a fist, leaving it on her lap as she 
simply sat on the table edge.
It was all so strange, and she couldn't explain it at all.

____________________________________________

* Iris's program indicated that somebot had asked for her assistance.*

" Scanns? Verify the reason why you have requested such things, please."

* She waited calmly for an answer...but she wasn't about to give info to 
just anyone for any reason.*

_____________________________________________

* Zyber entered the smaller cave in the rear of her own, the one which 
housed the stasis locked bot.
It was a shame that he was unconciouse, she would at least have liked to get 
a name out of him.
But, she was content enough to treat him without being on the basis of a 
name, just as long as he got well enough later to tell it to her.
Zyber walked up to the edge of her fur covered bed and set what she had 
brought with her beside it.
A bason of water and a few dried herbs from her storage space, a little bit 
of salve that she used on her own bumps and scrapes a few times a while ago 
and a drinking cup.
First she took the bason full of water and simply placed the herbs into it, 
then setting the large bowl onto a small rach set above the fire that she 
had riged earlier.
This would make a strong tea which would actually begin to warm up and 
repair the small systems that might be damaged, making it so that this new 
bot could heal on his own. With a bit of her help of course.
After tending to the tea she then picked up the small rock jar with the 
salve and walked over to the head of the bed, taking a fair sized wad of it 
onto her index and middle finger.
With practiced ease she rubbed the herbal salve onto the stasis locked bot's 
chest, knowing that it would desalve into the armor and actually begin to 
clear the lungs. And, if she was lucku, wake him up as well.
She rubbed in the salve until it had turned translicent, then simply wiped 
the remainder on her fingers off onto a piece of fur and thenwalked over to 
the tea again.
With a sigh Zyber sat down in front of the fire and leaned her back against 
the footboard.
All she could do now was wait and see if everything would work, and hope 
that the boit wouldn't be hostile when he awoke.*
